title: Selection
text: Think about the task of selecting a subset of items from a larger set. How would you describe this process when you're only concerned with choosing the objects, not the order in which they are arranged?

title: Choosing items
text: Consider the terms factorial and sequence. Do they apply to the situation where you're simply choosing items?

title: Not an arrangement
text: As you reflect on the process of selecting items without concern for order, think about how this differs from counting different arrangements or orderings. Which term would describe a selection process, rather than an arrangement?
